message.raw: Removed rpy<2.9 from setup.py. When installing Segtools using conda, rpy 2.8.6 is installed if env is python 2. rpy 2.9 is installed if env is python 3. python 3 tools need rpy 2.9 and python 2 tools work fine with rpy 2.8.6
message.html: Removed rpy<2.9 from setup.py. When installing Segtools using conda, rpy 2.8.6 is installed if env is python 2. rpy 2.9 is installed if env is python 3. python 3 tools need rpy 2.9 and python 2 tools work fine with rpy 2.8.6

summary.raw: Removed rpy<2.9 from setup.py. When installing Segtools using conda, rpy 2.8.6 is installed if env is python 2. rpy 2.9 is installed if env is python 3. python 3 tools need rpy 2.9 and python 2 tools work fine with rpy 2.8.6
summary.html: Removed rpy<2.9 from setup.py. When installing Segtools using conda, rpy 2.8.6 is installed if env is python 2. rpy 2.9 is installed if env is python 3. python 3 tools need rpy 2.9 and python 2 tools work fine with rpy 2.8.6

values.message: Removed rpy<2.9 from setup.py. When installing Segtools using conda, rpy 2.8.6 is installed if env is python 2. rpy 2.9 is installed if env is python 3. python 3 tools need rpy 2.9 and python 2 tools work fine with rpy 2.8.6

message.raw: Removed the version specification rpy2<2.9 in setup.py. When Segtools is installed in a Python 2 environment, rpy 2.8.6 is installed. When Segtools is installed in a Python 3 environment using conda, rpy 2.9 is installed. In this case, if we force rpy2<2.9, it will lead to errors
message.html: Removed the version specification rpy2<2.9 in setup.py. When Segtools is installed in a Python 2 environment, rpy 2.8.6 is installed. When Segtools is installed in a Python 3 environment using conda, rpy 2.9 is installed. In this case, if we force rpy2<2.9, it will lead to errors

summary.raw: Removed the version specification rpy2<2.9 in setup.py. When Segtools is installed in a Python 2 environment, rpy 2.8.6 is installed. When Segtools is installed in a Python 3 environment using conda, rpy 2.9 is installed. In this case, if we force rpy2<2.9, it will lead to errors
summary.html: Removed the version specification rpy2<2.9 in setup.py. When Segtools is installed in a Python 2 environment, rpy 2.8.6 is installed. When Segtools is installed in a Python 3 environment using conda, rpy 2.9 is installed. In this case, if we force rpy2<2.9, it will lead to errors

values.message: Removed the version specification rpy2<2.9 in setup.py. When Segtools is installed in a Python 2 environment, rpy 2.8.6 is installed. When Segtools is installed in a Python 3 environment using conda, rpy 2.9 is installed. In this case, if we force rpy2<2.9, it will lead to errors
